subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: If only all the goodbyes of a crumbling dynasty that produced 5 World Series victories and 17 playoff appearances in 18 years could be as uncomplicated as Mariano Rivera’s.
snippet: If only all the goodbyes of a crumbling dynasty that produced 5 World Series victories and 17 playoff appearances in 18 years could be as uncomplicated as Mariano Rivera’s.
